Discount.description:
For Customers, the Discount object cannot be null and cannot be an empty object.
For CrossReferences, the Discount object cannot be null but can be an empty object.

DiscountId.description:
Maps to the field Discounts.DiscountId in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

DiscountDescription.description:
Maps to the field Discounts.DiscountDescription in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: allowed

DiscountPercentage.description:
Maps to the field Discounts.DiscountPercentage in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Zero values: allowed
